ps1.7:4.1_0: Ahosi kusalaṁ kammaṁ, ahosi kusalassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:4.2_0: Ahosi kusalaṁ kammaṁ, nāhosi kusalassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:4.3_0: Ahosi kusalaṁ kammaṁ, atthi kusalassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:4.4_0: Ahosi kusalaṁ kammaṁ, natthi kusalassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:4.5_0: Ahosi kusalaṁ kammaṁ, bhavissati kusalassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:4.6_0: Ahosi kusalaṁ kammaṁ, na bhavissati kusalassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:5.1_0: Atthi kusalaṁ kammaṁ, atthi kusalassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:5.2_0: Atthi kusalaṁ kammaṁ, natthi kusalassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:5.3_0: Atthi kusalaṁ kammaṁ, bhavissati kusalassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:5.4_0: Atthi kusalaṁ kammaṁ, na bhavissati kusalassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:6.1_0: Bhavissati kusalaṁ kammaṁ, bhavissati kusalassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:6.2_0: Bhavissati kusalaṁ kammaṁ, na bhavissati kusalassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:7.1_0: Ahosi akusalaṁ kammaṁ, ahosi akusalassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:7.2_0: Ahosi akusalaṁ kammaṁ, nāhosi akusalassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:7.3_0: Ahosi akusalaṁ kammaṁ, atthi akusalassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:7.4_0: Ahosi akusalaṁ kammaṁ, natthi akusalassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:7.5_0: Ahosi akusalaṁ kammaṁ, bhavissati akusalassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:7.6_0: Ahosi akusalaṁ kammaṁ, na bhavissati akusalassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:8.1_0: Atthi akusalaṁ kammaṁ, atthi akusalassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:8.2_0: Atthi akusalaṁ kammaṁ, natthi akusalassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:8.3_0: Atthi akusalaṁ kammaṁ, bhavissati akusalassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:8.4_0: Atthi akusalaṁ kammaṁ, na bhavissati akusalassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:9.1_0: Bhavissati akusalaṁ kammaṁ, bhavissati akusalassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:9.2_0: Bhavissati akusalaṁ kammaṁ, na bhavissati akusalassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:10.8_0: ahosi dukkhavipākaṁ kammaṁ, ahosi dukkhavipākassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:10.9_0: Ahosi dukkhavipākaṁ kammaṁ, nāhosi dukkhavipākassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:10.10_0: Ahosi dukkhavipākaṁ kammaṁ, atthi dukkhavipākassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:10.11_0: Ahosi dukkhavipākaṁ kammaṁ, natthi dukkhavipākassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:10.12_0: Ahosi dukkhavipākaṁ kammaṁ, bhavissati dukkhavipākassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:10.13_0: Ahosi dukkhavipākaṁ kammaṁ, na bhavissati dukkhavipākassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:11.1_0: Atthi dukkhavipākaṁ kammaṁ, atthi dukkhavipākassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:11.2_0: Atthi dukkhavipākaṁ kammaṁ, natthi dukkhavipākassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:11.3_0: Atthi dukkhavipākaṁ kammaṁ, bhavissati dukkhavipākassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:11.4_0: Atthi dukkhavipākaṁ kammaṁ, na bhavissati dukkhavipākassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:12.1_0: Bhavissati dukkhavipākaṁ kammaṁ, bhavissati dukkhavipākassa kammassa vipāko.
ps1.7:12.2_0: Bhavissati dukkhavipākaṁ kammaṁ, na bhavissati dukkhavipākassa kammassa vipākoti.
